title: #29: FBI Abroad and Counter Terrorism with the FBI's Tim Clemente
description:
Former FBI Counter Terrorism expert Tim Clemente joins Lisa Zambetti (Criminal Minds casting director) and Bobby Chacon (Former FBI Agent) to talk about the FBI abroad, future terrorist attacks and the importance of knowing the history of Isis.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
